channel.title: Savings on FinanceCraftedSheets
channel.description: Recent content in Savings on FinanceCraftedSheets

item.title: How to Automate Personal Finance (So You Stop Thinking About Money)
item.description: Set up automated payments, transfers, and tracking so your finances run on autopilot. Stop managing money manually and let the system do the work.

item.title: Sizing Your Emergency Fund for Variable Income (The Real Formula)
item.description: The 3-6 months rule doesn't work for variable income. Here's how to calculate YOUR emergency fund number with real examples. Includes HYSA options and a realistic build-out timeline.
